Summary
Summary

➢ Receive sites are highly susceptible to in band interference ▪ Testing showed that complete data loss can be caused by an LTE handset transmitting near a receive site antenna even with relatively low transmit power
➢ Receive sites are highly susceptible to in band interference ➢ R e c e i v e
